entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 3:41 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: S 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
